content:
### Instructions ### 
 Here are the labels texts can be given, and some indicative keywords associated with each label, in the format '<label>': <keyword 1, keyword 2, ...>: 
 ----------------------------------- 
 ### List of labels ### 
 {categories} 
 ----------------------------------- 
 The task is non-exclusive, so you can provide more than one label. If none of the labels are appropriate to the given text, return `==NONE==`. Do not create new labels, and do not modify the provided labels. Label the following text with one or more labels from the list above: 
 ``` 
 {text} 
 ```
